PPSTF.summary: Pepsi-Cola Products Philippines, Inc. manufactures, sells, and distributes carbonated soft-drinks (CSD), non-carbonated beverages (NCB), and confectionery products to retail, wholesale, restaurant, and bar trades in the Philippines. It also manufactures, sells, and distributes food products and snacks. The company offers a range of CSD, NCB, and snacks under the Pepsi-Cola, 7Up, Mountain Dew, Mirinda, Mug, Gatorade, G-Active, Tropicana/Twister, Lipton, Sting, Propel, Milkis, Aquafina, Premier, Let's Be, Lay's, and Cheetos brands. It sells its products to supermarkets, restaurants, and convenience store chains through direct sales, distributors, and wholesalers. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Muntinlupa City, the Philippines.
